main event: A bright light in the sky, approximately the size of a dime at arm's length, was seen hovering for about 10 seconds in High Springs, Florida on February 6, 1957. The object then moved rapidly away at an approximate 45-degree angle without making any noise.
interesting points: The object was not identifiable as a star, plane, or astronomical object.
The investigating officer concluded that the object appeared to be intelligently controlled.
The document mentions a photograph or illustration of a bright light in the sky moving up and down in a round pattern, but no human faces are visible.
Noises were reported by the witnesses.
The sighting lasted for about 10 seconds.
